name: Sweet Potato Adzuki Bean Burger Gameday Sliders with Spinach, Cucumber, Dill Aioli. Vegan Recipe
description: Sweet potato Adzuki bean burger sliders with Spinach, cucumbers and dill aioli. Fresh, springy and easy. Vegan soy-free Recipe. Makes 7 to 8 patties
recipeIngredient: 1  Sweet Potato or Yam boiled (peeled, mashed. about 1 cup mashed)
1/2 teaspoon berbere spice (or other spice blend of choice-Cajun, garam masala etc)
1/2 teaspoon chili flakes or to taste
2-4 Tablespoons flour (Wheat or Oat or any gf flour. I used 2 Tbsp wheat)
Dill Jalapeno aioli  (add a teaspoon of chopped Dill to the Aioli recipe.)

recipeInstructions.text: Boil, peel and mash 1 large Sweet Potato or Yam.
recipeInstructions.name: Boil, peel and mash 1 large Sweet Potato or Yam.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rest of the ingredients except 1/4 cup bread crumbs. Mix, mash, mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rest of the ingredients except 1/4 cup bread crumbs. Mix, mash, mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt if needed. Chill for 15 minutes so the mixture gets less sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt if needed. Chill for 15 minutes so the mixture gets less sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Make patties and coat in bread crumbs. I made 3 inch wide and 1/2-3/4 inch thick patties. The mixture might be sticky. Use flour or oil on hands to work. Once baked, the patties are quite sturdy.
recipeInstructions.name: Make patties and coat in bread crumbs. I made 3 inch wide and 1/2-3/4 inch thick patties. The mixture might be sticky. Use flour or oil on hands to work. Once baked, the patties are quite sturdy.

recipeInstructions.text: (Use gf bread crumbs or coarsely ground Oats for glutenfree)
recipeInstructions.name: (Use gf bread crumbs or coarsely ground Oats for glutenfree)

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 25-30 minutes at 375 degrees F / 190ºc, until golden and dry on the outside.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 25-30 minutes at 375 degrees F / 190ºc, until golden and dry on the outside.

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange Spinach on the buns, Top with a burger patty, Cucumbers, Dill Aioli, Fresh Dill and the top half of the bun.
recipeInstructions.name: Arrange Spinach on the buns, Top with a burger patty, Cucumbers, Dill Aioli, Fresh Dill and the top half of the bun.
